author: andschwa
body:
<!--
Before submitting this pull request, please first:

- [ ] State that it "Resolves #xyz".
- [ ] Ensure your code is up-to-date with `master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](../docs).
- [ ] Assign the PR to the appropriate subsystem [maintainer](https://aka.ms/psowners).
- [ ] Check that your commits follow our [contributing guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md)
-->

Also teach `Start-PSBootstrap` the parameters `Channel` and `Version` to
pass to .NET CLI's obtain scripts.

This fixes the current build failure. See https://github.com/dotnet/cli/issues/3570.

Thanks @brthor for LKG version.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
(BTW @vors the warnings on Linux of 

```
deb http://llvm.org/apt/trusty/ llvm-toolchain-trusty-3.6 main
W: Failed to fetch http://llvm.org/apt/trusty/dists/llvm-toolchain-trusty-3.6/main/binary-amd64/Packages  404  Not Found

W: Failed to fetch http://llvm.org/apt/trusty/dists/llvm-toolchain-trusty-3.6/main/binary-i386/Packages  404  Not Found
```

We can't do anything about. The LLVM apt-feed has been taken down until further notice; but it appears we're no longer needing those packages? I'll look into it later.)

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @andschwa yes, I noticed this warnings and it looks like we don't need these feed anymore (since everything builds fine without them)

title: Pin .NET CLI to LKG version 1.0.0-preview2-003067
